/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -pipe -march=nocona -ffast-math -Wall -Winvalid-pch -mfpmath=sse  -fopenmp -O3 -DNDEBUG   -shared -Wl,-soname,spot.so -o ../../binaries/plugins/spot.so CMakeFiles/spot.dir/spot.cpp.o ../../binaries/libmitsuba-core.so ../../binaries/libmitsuba-render.so ../../binaries/libmitsuba-hw.so ../../binaries/libmitsuba-render.so ../../binaries/libmitsuba-core.so -lz -lpng -lz -lpng -ljpeg -lHalf -lIex -lImath -lIlmThread -lpthread -lIlmImf -lboost_filesystem -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lpthread -lpthread -lIlmImf -lboost_filesystem -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lpthread -ldl -lfftw3 -lfftw3_threads -lrt -lxerces-c -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lGLEWmx -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lGLEWmx -lXxf86vm -Wl,-rpath,/home/pony/mitsuba/binaries:
